footer.left_text: These pages are open source, and built with our Landing Pages Plugin for Discourse. We've used a background made by Franzi. We've used animations made by Henrique Rossatto on LottieFiles, Shakuro on both LottieFiles and Drawer, Dotolina on LottieFiles and by Drawer itself. We've used icons made by Icons8. Those assets are used under license, and the copyright belongs to their wonderful creators.

items.label: welcome
items.description: We build user-friendly open source software for community platforms.
